Representative Mike Pence of Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. Program, the U.S. Treasury can restrict senior management's compensation. ''It was absolutely owed that we treat our people properly,'' CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts and reporters on a conference call. The obligation to our people was much greater than the need to improve our bottom-line profitability. Sergio Marchionne chose the term performance award rather than profit sharing because ''it's difficult to talk about profit sharing when you have a negative number at the bottom line.''
